title: conferred on me by subsection (2) of section 23 of the Credit Union Act 1997
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Credit Union Act 1997 (Section 23)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Credit Union Act 1997 (Section 23) 

Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited credit union act 1997 (section 23) order 2024

title: conferred on me by subsection (2) of section 23 of the Credit Union Act 1997
heading: 2. The amount of €18,000 is specified for the purpose of subsection (1) of
text_raw:
2. The amount of €18,000 is specified for the purpose of subsection (1) of 

section 23 of the Credit Union Act 1997 (No. 15 of 1997). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 February, 2024. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th February, 2024.
